content:
Yes, the two formulas can be combined into a single formula, like this:
```scss
=TEXT((((B3-(5/24))-DATE(1899,12,30))*86400)/86400+DATE(1899,12,30),"MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss AM/PM")
```
This formula will take the date string in cell B3, convert it to epoch time in GMT-5, and then convert it back to a date string in the format `MM/DD/YYYY hh:mm:ss AM/PM`. Simply copy and paste this formula into a new cell, and the result should be:
```
01/17/2023 12:26:31 PM
```
